name: Pulut Adventure
description: Pulut Adventure is a 2D platform game with over 30 different stylistic levels and exciting mechanics. Defeat the enemy and collect different of weapon to advance your abilities. You can use the summon skills and flying mode to explore the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 drivers on GeForce 8 series or Radeon HD series (or better) Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: WTF AM I PLAYING! This game is directed by Michael Bay. EXPLOSIVES EVERYWHERE! I finished the game in just 20 minutes by defeating the last boss (I call it flying dark lord). Killing the last boss only get you to the credits. There is no story in this game.  You control a badass invicible little blue slime. In the 1st level, you can only stomp to kill but after that you got sword, summon, shuriken, and flying bubble. Pretty much you become the most powerful slime in the entire galaxy.  There is copyrighted characters in this game such as Patrick Starfish from Spongebob Squarepants, Elsa from Frozen and some Angry birds' bird.
